#000001.title: Collect Wrygrass
#000001.description: Collect 5 bundles of wrygrass. They can be commonly seen growing in the fields outside the city gates

#000002.title: Collect Coksweed
#000002.description: Collect 9 bundles of coksweed. They can be commonly seen growing in the fields outside the city gates

#000003.title: Collect Gustbloom
#000003.description: Collect 21 gustbloom buds. They are found growing on the sides of cliffs and other areas with high wind

#000004.title: Subjugate Goblins
#000004.description: Goblins are a nuisance to the area. They can be found roaming near roads around the city. Eliminate 14 of them

#000005.title: Eliminate Bandits
#000005.description: A group of bandits have been harassing merchants near the city. Destroy their group. (Extra rewards available for capturing bandits alive)
